short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in holiday cheer with a beautifully decorated Christmas tree on your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into a festive scene with the Decorated Christmas Tree Live Wallpaper. This Chrome extension adds a beautifully lit and ornamented Christmas tree to your new tab, creating a warm and cheerful holiday atmosphere. Perfect for embracing the spirit of Christmas while browsing!

Features:
🎄 Stunning live wallpaper of a decorated Christmas tree.
🌐 Customizable search bar to fit your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display to help you stay organized during the holidays.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts for easy navigation to your favorite websites.
Enhance your holiday experience with this festive extension, making every new tab feel like a joyful celebration.

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
